snippet.title: Mars Vice Trailer
snippet.description:
In-game trailer for the upcoming Mars Vice, a Queer Biopunk Adventure that follows a pair of civil investigators as they track down police corruption in the Martian city of Pavonis.

Coming to Steam & Itch .io

Follow us on Twitter for updates here - https://twitter.com/MarsViceGame

Music for the trailer provided by June LaLonde, check out her works here - https://junelalonde.bandcamp.com/
